reviews.customers_say: Customers love the dress's color and find it super comfortable, with nice material that feels good. The dress receives positive feedback for its quality, and one customer mentions it's perfect for summer weddings. The fit and size receive mixed reviews - while some say it's a perfect fit, others find it baggy, and while some appreciate the medium size, others say it's slightly bigger than expected. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable fit
items.body: This is absolutely beautiful! I was un sure of it as I pulled it out of the package but once I put it on.. WOW! it's very comfortable, and it's just the right length with heels on. It forms to your body but isn't skin tight. It has some good stretch to it. I love this dress a lot! Read more
items.author: Caren Eberth

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great look
items.body: This is a beautiful dress. I purchased it as a back up for a formal event in December but have decided to wear it. Soft fabric, great length with heels, perfect color black. Read more
items.author: my3sons

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Didn't fit me at all.
items.body: I was not impressed with this dress at all..For the size that I received which was an xs it did not fit me like a glove. It fit me baggy. The material was heavy, yet thin, there's a very flimsy white elastic band that's used to help hold the top up in place. Out of the packaging you can't really tell how the top part is suppoae to fit. It just felt as if I was wearing a potato sack bag. It may fit those curvier better than someone small in size. I'm 5'5" tall and 102lbs just to give an idea for those like me looking for a dress. I do habe some curves to me though. Read more
items.author: Tristaya

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress
items.body: I used it for my church wedding ceremony. It was comfortable, true to size, no smell, material is good, Read more
items.author: Maggie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVED ITT

items.author: Maria Vallejo

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Kinda cheap but cute
items.body: Looks good but obviously cheap and feels cheap. Has a slip underneath that is shorter (above the knee) than the actual dress (to feet) so if you get anything other than black, that seam of the slip will show through. Slightly bigger than it should be but not by much. If you usually run smaller, size down, if not, youâ€™ll be fine getting your normal size. But if you want true body con effect; size down. Read more
items.author: Zane

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best dress ever!
items.body: So I bought this dress, pulled It out of the package hated how it looked plus it felt heavy. My fiancÃ© kept insisting that I should Atleast try it onðŸ™„ So I did just for his benefit!!! This dress was so perfect and flattering that it left me speechless!! 10 stars!!!! Read more
items.author: Colette Colthirst

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Incredibly sheer
items.body: Sheer and thin, super long and the top is really uncomfortable Read more
items.author: Tanessa Whitmire

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Long Sleeve Bodycon Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Long Sleeve Bodycon Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Light Blue, Plain Black, Plain Red, Mauve Purple, Dark Blue, Hot Pink, Pure Pink, Pure White, Light Yellow, Plain Khaki, Solid Brown, Solid Burgundy. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
